mapper.select:
select auth_id --권한아이디 , auth_nm1 --권한명(키르키즈어) , auth_nm2 --권한명(러시아어) . auth_nm3 --권한명(한국어) , use_yn --사용여부 , ord --순서 , reg_id , reg_dt , mod_id , mod_dt from com_auth where 1=1
and auth_nm1 like concat('%', #{authNm1}, '%')
and auth_nm2 like concat('%', #{authNm2}, '%')
and auth_nm3 like concat('%', #{authNm3}, '%')
select auth_id , auth_nm1 , auth_nm2 , auth_nm3 , use_yn , ord , reg_id , reg_dt , mod_id , mod_dt from com_auth where auth_id = #{authId}
